title: RiotPenguin's Fan Art for Fans!
body:
##Ever had a super cool skin idea, but didn't know how to draw it? Well I'm here to help! 

Post your concepts here – And every now and then, I’ll do a sketch of one on my [**stream! **](http://www.twitch.tv/riot_penguin)
(You can also post ideas to @RiotPenguin, using #riotpenguinart on Twitter)

If you have any questions about me, my art, or the stream, check out the [**FAQ.**](http://riotpenguin.blogspot.com/2013/12/faq.html) If you still have unanswered questions after that, feel free to ask :)

Now let's see what ya got!!
-------------
##***PLEASE NOTE*** - **These are *NOT* being created officially for League of Legends or Riot Games** 
These are personal sketches that I’m doing for fans, FOR FUN. as an artist who loves LoL and it’s community. These are for you all! :)
-------------

##**GALLERY**:
Below are some of my all time favorite past sketches! -- to see the complete list, check out the [**Fan Art for Fans Gallery!**](http://riotpenguin.blogspot.com/2013/12/fan-art-for-fans.html) 

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UFofLBVpYi0/VlIZjQEOIYI/AAAAAAAAAlE/t9OMdMy1n_c/s1600/TheOmegaSquad.jpg

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gv5bxb7J6cw/VE3Re2-jBGI/AAAAAAAAAfM/DlLOOVuON9g/s1600/UndeadJinx.jpg
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bINBI-nKftI/U-gQPf-0pNI/AAAAAAAAAdw/Cma6n7HYQyM/s1600/GLADiatorBraum.jpg

Hey everyone, thanks for the great ideas! I just updated the [**Fan Art for Fans Gallery**](http://riotpenguin.blogspot.com/2013/12/fan-art-for-fans.html) with **Undead Jinx** and **Soul Stone Taric** -- Thanks to everyone who tuned in for the stream, and keep postin' them ideas for next time!

Anchorman Nautilus

{{champion:111}} - I am in an iron suit of emotions
Just remember,  **Great Hair**

{{champion:34}} : Sandstorm Anivia! It would be a Shurima themed skin, similar to Azir in concept. Glacial Storm would become a sandstorm, Crystallize would raise a wall of crumbling rock or pillars, Frostbite would be a large spike of sand, and Flash Frost would be a ball of light like the sun. When she dies, instead of an egg, she could return to a Sarcophagus before being reborn!
Heartseeker Quinn!!
Valor could be a dove! Maybe?
Heartseeker Twitch!!!
Ice cream man Braum. Wearing the paperhat, striped shirt with white bibbed overalls. and white shoes and a ice cream truck door as his shield. and of course The Mustache.

I know it doesn't fit under your evil skin ideas, so if not that then how about [Underworld Lucian](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/foZmX7VY-a-holiday-skins-what-would-you-want-to-see-a?comment=000f)? He literally sacrifices his soul for Senna, but becomes a twisted phantom in the process.

Here's ** [Pretty Pretty Princess Sion](http://riotpenguin.blogspot.com/2013/12/fan-art-for-fans.html) ** for *DMC75001*!

Hey @RiotPenguin, 
{{champion:90}} Malzahar hasn't had a skin in a while I believe, and he would be a prime candidate for the dragon master theme. 
His voidlings could be mini dragons or dragonlings. 

His Q would produce flames from both portals , or the portals themselves could be dragon heads spewing fire. (Something akin to a fire mage's dragons breath in WoW, on each side)

His W could turn into a ring of fire.

His new Maelfic Visions could immolate its targets.

His ult would look like a flamethrower or something similar, perhaps like the flamethrower in Mythbuster's "Fire vs. Ice" episode.

I think the dragon voidlings would make the skin though. At the various stages of voidling frenzy, the dragonlings could mature and get bigger. (I.E. when first summoned, the dragonling begins as a whelp, and eventually turns into a full fledged dragon after 14 seconds.)

_____


Unrelated to Malzahar, (or possibly related to, please blow my mind) I would love to see you draw some Warhammer 40k themed skins for any champions that you feel could be done justice in that style. {{champion:268}} Azir already resembles a Necron Lord, and could summon Necron soldiers and his passive tower could be a Monolith. Tyranid void creatures. {{champion:42}} Corki could be in a land speeder. Dreadnought Rumble{{champion:68}} . Imperial Guard Engineer Heimerdinger {{champion:74}} with various heavy weapons and artillery as his turrets. Anything Space Marine would particularly awesome, these are just a few I thought of off the top of my head. 
(I think somewhere above there is a request for a Lucian skin that is Warhammer 40k themed btw)

Thanks
I love the Dragon Master Malz idea - very well thought out!

It's been a while since I posted an update, because it took that long to complete my fan-suggested concept for [THE OMEGA SQUAD](http://riotpenguin.blogspot.com/2013/12/fan-art-for-fans.html)! 

Enjoy!
wait theres a person called riot penguin? awesome penguins are amazing! they will one-day rule the world!

**Trailer Park Jarvan** {{champion:59}}

Trucker hat, Tank-top, Jean shorts, American flag, Old school tv antenna, Above ground pool ult.

{{champion:74}} - **Witch Doctor Heimerdinger** *or* {{champion:45}} - **Witch Doctor Veigar**

{{champion:9}} - **Five Nights at Fiddles'**: He's not a true harbinger of fear until he's a worn-down Animatronic horror!

{{champion:80}} - **Haunted Pantheon**: I can't suggest this one enough. Good ol' Scooby Doo-level haunted suits of armor!

{{champion:161}} - **Deep Terror Vel'Koz**: There can never be enough tentacles... Also a beak, because that beam of water has to come from *somewhere*.

{{champion:131}} - **PROJECT: Diana**

{{champion:268}} - **Pirate Azir**: If he can't have his kingdom back, this tropical prince can at least gather a crew of undead scallywags to his side!

{{champion:6}} - **Brood Lord Urgot**: How about a legion of *spiiiiiiders*?!

{{champion:76}} - **Feral Nidalee**: She has a lot of cat skins, but I think she could make a pretty terrific werewolf, either medieval or old-school Londoner in flavor.
Sailor Diana + other mids (Lux, Syndra, Ahri, etc). As in magical warriors in mini skirts, not actual sailors like Sailor Gangplank.

well, we already ran through Sobek, Anubis, and Ra for major god figtures.....
maybe base her on Sekhmet...lioness headed Egyptian warrior goddess

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sekhmet

Skin team should really consider this one, its a great idea and REALLY fits in theme since Sekhmet is sometimes referred to as the daughter of Ra and Sivir is of Azir's lineage

Police officer {{champion:78}} . Slick blue hat like Vi , aviator glasses, and a nightstick instead of her hammer.  Her ult could have a bunch of sirens. I could and would die happy :). Please make my dream a reality! Demacian PD 4 lyfe

I kinda want to see Steel Legion Quinn

Also, Mon-Star Sion.{{champion:14}} 
 Another one I came up with (If I'm not being too greedy with requests)

Personality: Daruis is the guy with the skills, but Sion would probably be that guy whose overly aggressive, argumentative and constantly calling fouls while yelling how blind the ref is while he elbows you. 

Appearance (Jersey number: XL)

    (Upper Body) I'd imagine the same color scheme as Daruis', wears a jersey with the left shoulder strap fitting snugly while The other side torn off and strapless because Sion is too freaking big.  The jersey doesn't even fit over his waist all the way, exposing some of his upper waist. Instead of that dagge rin the back of his head, let's give him a sweatband holding back his cut off ponytail and a Giant mouth-guard to replace his... jaw.. thing.

    (Lower Body) - Upper potion (Elastic Part) should be shown because his shirt isn't  large enough and probably have a Noxus symbol on it. Because of how thick his legs are, I'd imagine the lower pants portion being torn up a bit. His shoes are too small for him, his feet bursting right through the sneakers.

    (Weapon) His axe is themed like Darius, but it's the scoreboard. It displays Sion's actual score. His Kills vs how many times he has died with the "Home/Away" representing the two ratios.

PRETTY PRINCESS SION.

NOW. PLZ RITO.
